verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים <S%H4615><s%> Out of the depths קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> have I cried יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto thee O LORD

אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> Lord שִׁמְעָ֪ה <S%H8085><s%> hear בְק֫וֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> my voice תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> Let אָ֭זְנֶיךָ <S%H241><s%> let thine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <S%H7183><s%> be attentive לְ֝ק֗וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <S%H5771><s%> iniquities תִּשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> shouldest mark יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> If thou LORD אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> O Lord מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> who shall stand
כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עִמְּךָ֥ <S%H5973><s%> there הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה <S%H5547><s%> But [there is] forgiveness לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> with thee that thou mayest be feared

קִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6960><s%> I wait יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD קִוְּתָ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> doth wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ <S%H1697><s%> and in his word הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H3176><s%> do I hope

נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> My soul לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> [waiteth] for the Lord מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <S%H8104><s%> more than they that watch לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> for the morning שֹׁמְרִ֥ים <S%H8104><s%> [I say more than] they that watch לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> for the morning

יַחֵ֥ל <S%H3176><s%> hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Let Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְה֫וָה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for with the LORD הַחֶ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [there is] mercy וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> and with him [is] plenteous עִמּ֣וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with פְדֽוּת׃ <S%H6304><s%> redemption

וְ֭הוּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> And he shall redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5771><s%> from all his iniquities
